  Interface java.Nutmeg.Sortable




  
 public interface Sortable
  
 extends Object


Copyright (c) 1995, 1996 THOUGHT Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Sortable class (an indexable class).

This adds the concept of ordering or sorting to a class object.  If any
Object is to be Ordered or Sorted by the OrderedCollection/SortedCollection
or Dictionary classes, they must be derived from this class.





  




  
 
	compare(Object)
  
 Compare the current object with an object that's passed in to see
if they are equal.





  



compare

  public abstract int compare(Object anObject)




  
 Compare the current object with an object that's passed in to see
if they are equal.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anObject - the object we are comparing with
    
 Returns:
    
 int -1 if less than, 0 if equal and 1 if greater than anObject
